summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department and authorizing the sale and removal of certain timber in portions of Sections 21 and 27, Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W.M. and in the SW 1/4 of NE 1/4, Section 2, Township 21 North, Range 9 East, W.M., in the Cedar River Watershed under contract with the Mountain Tree Farm Company.
